title: Having issues Patching 7.17? Click Here!
body:
Hey everyone,

Sure, the great eclipse across NA was "natural". Uh huh.  Thats just what they want you to think *-puts tin-foil hat on-*  Its a conspiracy damn you!  They just didn't want you watching the heavens and seeing this picture that I totally took on my Demacian x190 Waifu Camera:

http://i.imgur.com/0P1HAzh.jpg

I for one, welcome our new star guardian overlords.  If you want to embrace the future, but can't get the patcher to work, the steps below should shine some light on the problem.  Otherwise, hit us up and senpai will be happy to help out!

------------------------------------------------

># New skins where?!

New content like skins slated to release during a patch doesn't necessarily mean it will be on the same day.  Bookmark the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for news and info on new or upcoming content.


>#Why does the End of Game Stats screen take FOREVER to freakin' load?!

This might be due to the "Close Client During Game" option in the client.  This option makes the client close out when you enter a game, which means after the game it has to completely reboot to start.  Low Spec Mode should be enough to keep things running smoothly, so disable this option by entering the client, clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner, [and unchecking the box.](http://i.imgur.com/smwR8be.png)

>#I've  tried the Updated Client before, and it was sooooo laggy

We've made some massive changes to the Updated Client make it run as smoothly as possible, even on the proudest of potatoes.  Enable Low Spec Mode if it isn’t on already.  You can find out by clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner of the Updated Client and then [click "Enable Low Spec Mode"](http://i.imgur.com/rPGRnYW.png)

>#Patching Failed and we're not sure why Error: 004

This error usually occurs when Operating System Permissions isn't set properly.  Essentially, the patcher is trying to access files found on your hard drive, but it is being denied from doing so.  [Follow the steps in this guide to get this resolved!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

>#Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching Error: 003

Occurs when the patcher isn't able to maintain a stable connection with our Patcher Servers.  If the patcher loses connection to the server to get the necessary files, it will simply stop working.  To get this resolved, [make sure to complete all of the solutions in this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

--------------------------------------

If you have a problem that isn’t here or those solutions aren’t working, drop a comment below and we’ll be sure to respond and help you out!  ^.^

replies.body: i tryed everything nothing helps :( still error 003

I've been hearing from a number of different players that they're getting stuck with this 003 error, and so far the usual methods haven't seemed to help. Do me a favor if you can and try using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **reinstall and clean uninstall** and let me know if that helps or not!

Hello I posted this elsewhere but you seem to be actively watching this thread so I'm moving it over here. 

I am also having the same problem. It is stuck in an infinite loop for some reason.

Update: I tried restarting computer and repairing the client. When I tried repairing the client it told me it failed I checked your guide on what to do when this happens and I made sure I did all the things it asked but when I tried it again it still failed.

Update 2: Tried using the hextech repair tool (run as admin) and tried to do a reinstall and it failed to download installer so I tried to do force re patch and it crashed the repair tool :l

Oh snap, the reinstall didn't even work either? Let's go ahead and get you in touch with our techies in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they'll be able to walk you through a few more in-depth steps. Make sure to send them the logs created by the HRT so they can take a look!

Heyo! I'm sure someone has already said this, but randomly when sitting at the home page the game will say something went wrong and they need to revert to an earlier version and then re-patch, it's happened two or three times now, if there's a fix or a workaround, let me know!

You might have some bad game files that's causing the client to crash.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if a force repatch can fix this up for you!

I am having trouble logging into my client, every time I try it just says "An unexpected error occurred while you were logging in. Please try again. if this issue persists contact support at support.riotgames.com" or sometimes it will say "Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here. If it looks good, follow the guide here." I tried running the hextech troubleshooter and I tried using the in the settings on the login page in the client. I have tried the whole guide, reinstalled the patch and can not figure it out. This has been going on for atleast 5 days! Please help!

This might be due to a connection issue and not necessarily your game files, so the HRT would be mostly good for reconfiguring your firewall settings.  Instead, the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix things up.

So, I managed to patch okay, and buy skins and play around in the League launcher client. I even queued up an invasion match, selected hero, etc.

Then the problem happened...

The secondary game client opened and then didn't ever respond? I tried closing it and reconnecting. I tried repairing. My primary launcher client is still reading "Game is still in progress..." and I'm feeling worse and worse for not being able to actually open or play the game to help them.. :(

The only thing that changed for me between this patch and the last was some hardware. I'm now running a 1080ti and an i7-7700k.

It sounds like your client is going into a dormant state, and failing to get a connection to the game server.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help stabilize your network and back into game!
LoL in fullscreen is forcing maximum refresh rate and not using the refresh rate set on desktop

i still have the orn screen and i cant see my loot or home page 
 pleas help :/

I got the client patch taken care of last night, but every time I try to get the patch patch done so I can play Invasion, it goes fast for a few seconds then slows to a crawl for several minutes before stabilizing at something like 10% of the download speed I get when downloading new Steam games. I'm not sure if League's data is getting throttled or if something's jacked up somewhere, but this patching process should NOT be taking nearly this long. Like, my PS4 can download faster than this. What's going on?

My friend gifted me 2 wukong skins a couple months ago. They were Radiant Wukong and Jade Dragon. For some reason a couple days ago they just dissapered i tried to use the skins and it says i have to buy it again. Riot if you could help me with this problem that would be great.
Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can take a closer look with you directly to find out what happened.
can you guys give me a link to the full game?
You should be able to get the game downloaded right over here -> [**download**](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)

This could be happening if your pc somehow lost the admin rights it had setup for League to run when it was previously installed. Hit up this [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide really quick, but definitely hit me back up if that doesn't help though!

OOOOOOOOOOOOOOHHH MMMMMMYYY GUUUUUUUUUDDDD! IT WORKED BRO! Thank you soooooooo, soooooo much I have been wasting like 5 days of my life trying to find solutions! And yours worked..... PERFECTLY!!! League of Legends is my go-to game, and I can't wait to teach my uncle how to play it (he loves videogames. I go to his house for console games that are not league of legends). I think disabling my UAC, or cleaning my hard drive did it. Maybe, I deleted the League of Legends setup wizard in my files and that did it. I'm not sure but I am happy that you helped me. Thanks a lot, and can i friend request you? I would love to see you on the Summoner's Rift! 






YOU HAVE HEALED ME!   {{summoner:7}}      {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}       {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}      {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Ayyyyyy glad you were able to get back in! Feel free to hit me up on the Rift too ^_^!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Thank you for the advice. I am on my phone currently, very tired and it is late and I just noticed your message. I will check that thing right now but I hope we can continue solving this tomorow due to the lateness of this conversation. Also please respond since I might get a new computer and I wanna know for future reference. Thank you for the advice and I will respond tomorrow ASAP üòÅ     P.S. When I was talking about that "L" sign..... it was in the middle of the screen and everything had a background (like I said) but the tab would just exit after a while. Not immediately if any misunderstanding was there.

Do you have any idea when the SG will be release? I know it's not the same day of the patch but I really really want to buy the ahri skin right now like no matter if you had to add things I just want her cause tbh it's the best skin ever
They should be hitting the store around Sept 7th when the event officially starts I believe!
and I'll do everything to buy her right now

I won a matchmade game as malzahar and i didn't recieve the meaga orb from the mission. yes, the mission was there before i played the game in my match haitory it shoed i played malzahar and i won but the mission is not completed

It all started like 6 hours ago, I was playing a normal game and we were losing then someone started a surrender vote, it failed but somehow I have been disconnected. I tried to join the game again but this showed up. http://i.imgur.com/jwnwYff.png
The client became so slow afterwards, and the main page of the client said "we were unable to load this page please try again in a few minutes". i did that and it loaded then i clicked play but it said "we can't create a lobby right now please restart your client" i did that but the login time is so slow, it takes like 6-7 minutes to login and it did the "we were unable to load this page.."again but i was able to click play this time, i chose blind pick then find match. i clicked accept and it was stuck for like 2 minutes then "an unexpected error occured while displaying ready check" the game works fine on bots game and practice tool. a friend invited me to a game and on champ select i couldn't see any champions then the game said "you have been set to low priority queue because you left many games on champ select" but I DIDN'T LEAVE anything 
I dont know what's wrong, i tried "full repair" but nothing changed. restarted my router and the computer and still nothing
http://i.imgur.com/41DkYY3.png
http://i.imgur.com/SW7phBQ.png
-------------- 
edit: did another full repair but the "we were not able to load this page" error still occurs 
I managed to join a game, champ select was fine 
but team fights were "freezing" I can't see my teammates or enemies' movements, it's like the game skips them then i see myself dead 
it's not like the game literally lags but it leads me to think im still alive, my opponent doesn't do anything while im attacking him and suddenly im dead 
my ping is around 70-100 and i run the game on 50-25 fps and this never happened before the patch

Essentially this is happening because your network is having a hard time maintaining its connection with the game servers for some reason. It might actually be due to some packet loss, which would make sense if your champion is suddenly freezing and then POOF you're dead. Run a quick test for packet loss using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and let it scan some of the recent network logs from one of those weird games. Take a screenshot and paste it here so I can go over it with you.

http://i.imgur.com/4hcOgTu.png
http://i.imgur.com/kKHxV9W.png

here, but what can I do to fix this? will it continue for so long?

Looks like I was right about that packet loss. Since it usually happens outside of your network but before it ever reaches our servers, it's most likely being caused by an ISP issue, but let's go ahead and get you over to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can see if adjusting a few settings can get you playing normally again!
I need help with launching league because every time I press the launch button the launcher just disappears. I own a mac, so its probably mac related.

You might be having the Mac equivalent of a permissions issue. Essentially, if your Mac OS doesn't recognize certain programs then there's a chance for it to shut it down thinking that it's unsafe. You should be able to get that straightened out by following [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9), but let me know if that doesn't help!

{{champion:516}}  About the new champion Ornn, When I use my Mac OX, I find a problem, I can not see him, not only when I played him, but also my teammates used him, he was becoming a model shadow, when he move, I can see his shadow in the game. I think just in the Mac OX, because when I change for the Windows I can see the all Ornn. And please fix it, thanks.
Thanks for the head's up! The devs are already working on figuring out why this is only affecting certain Macs and not all of them, but they should have it figured out soon!

This morning i had played a game and my ping was between 35-45 which is where it has been and stayed since i started playing league. I haven't changed anything on my side having to with my network but the first game I hopped into my ping was a solid 80-100 and fluctuating more rapidly than ever before. I closed all other windows (normally not a problem for me) and the ping persisted at 80-100. Not sure what happened tried re-patching but even running as admin the hextech tool crashes. Not sure whats up or if anyone else has had this issue?

A lot of people have been having some major issues getting the patch installed, so you're a step ahead of the bunch right now xD!

Let's see if we can get your ping stabilized a bit by making a few changes to your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Run through the steps in that guide, and let me know what works and what doesn't.

When the client restarts to begin patching, the loading screen (before the client reopens to start installing the patch) loads up to the MBs it needs to complete, but the nothing happens, instead the amount of MB downloaded exceeds what it says it needed

ATM after letting it run again it's currently at ETA 0 min, 320 MB / 54.9 MB and climbing

Edit: ETA now says -1 mins
Edit 2: It seems as though the 54.9 MB needed to complete the download was incorrect, as after letting it run, it eventually reached whatever the actual amount needed was, and everything is all well and done
After your second edit, it seems like you were able to finally get everything working as normal. Let me know if you're still having issues though!

i just tried to send a ticket and it wont even let me do that. hextech repair tool wont work either. crashes and says the chromium frame works stoped working.  i attached all the files it asked for in the ticket and it wont let me submit it. just keeps spinning on the submit button. been like that for over an hour now.

Hey there, sorry to hear about all this trouble you've been experiencing.  :(  You can reach out to us directly via email instead: support@riotgames.com.  Be sure to include that you can't access the HRT and ticketing center, your specific issue could be linked to a single problem.  See you there!
ah i just checked my email i guess the ticket did finaly go through a bit ago thank you.
